title.en: Legal Acts on Building and Spatial Planning

assessment_scale.et: Eristav (A, B, C, D, E, F, mi)
assessment_scale.en: differentiated (A, B, C, D, E, F, not present)

description.en: The course provides an overview of the legal relationship  on building and spatial planning that are regulated by law and other legal acts in force in the Republic of Estonia. Students get acquainted with the laws regulating building and planning in other EU and neighbouring countries. A separate approach is given to central legal acts that regulate building activities (Planning Act, Building Act, Heritage Conservation Act, Law of Property Act, etc.) and relevant institutions.
description.et: Kursusel antakse ülevaade ehitust ja planeerimist puudutavatest õiguslikest suhetest, mis on reguleeritud seaduste ja teiste õigusaktidega. Tutvutakse ehitus- ja planeerimiskorraldusega teistes EL ja naaberriikides. Põhjalikumalt tutvutakse ehitust reguleerivate õigusaktide (Planeerimisseadus, Muinsuskaitseseadus, Asjaõigusseadus) ja vastavate institutsioonidega.

objectives.en: Provide an overview of the legal background of building and spatial planning.
objectives.et: Anda üliõpilasele ülevaade Eesti Vabariigis ehitamist ja planeerimist reguleerivatest aktidest.

learning_outcomes.en: Upon successful completion of the course students acquire elementary knowledge of legal acts and contracts pertaining to building and spatial planning.
learning_outcomes.et: Kursuse edukal läbimisel üliõpilane omandab üliõpilane oma valdkonnas elementaarse õigusteadlikkuse ning lepinguvalmiduse.
